sentences.en: " Of course we are, " he said, with the slightest modification of sharpness.
sentences.cn: “ 当然肯定罗, " 他说, 他那生硬的口气只是稍稍有一点缓和.

sentences.en: A modification of the common - origin theory accounts for the density discrepancy.
sentences.cn: 关于共同起源的理论,有一种改进的论点解释了密度的不符.

sentences.en: Evidently he expected to restore their old friendship at once and without modification.
sentences.cn: 很显然,他是想立刻原原本本地恢复他们往日的交情.

sentences.en: Gravitation is presumably a modification of space - time.
sentences.cn: 万有引力则大概是空时的一种变态.

sentences.en: Modification for synthetic purposes on the Diels - Alder adducts 56 and 62 has only rarely been considered.
sentences.cn: 为了达到合成的目的,对Diels-Alder加 成物(56)和(62)加以改造的问题很少有人考虑.

sentences.en: Perhaps general relativity will require modification.
sentences.cn: 或许将要修改广义相对论.

sentences.en: Successive improvements and modification led to modern models of high capacity.
sentences.cn: 经过不断地改进和完善导致高生产能力的新型装置.

sentences.en: The corrector is a modification of the Crank - Nicolson equation.
sentences.cn: 校正式是克兰克 -尼科尔森 方程的修改式.
这个设计需要作大的修改.

sentences.en: The dimensions or prestressing force and eccentricity require modification.
sentences.cn: 尺寸或预加力和偏心需要修改.

sentences.en: The law passed by Congress was a modification of the original bill.
sentences.cn: 国会通过的那项法律是原议案的修正稿.

sentences.en: The law, in its present form, is unjust; it needs modification.
sentences.cn: 现行的法律是不公正的; 它需要修改.

sentences.en: The modification of his anger made him able to think clearly again.
sentences.cn: 他的怒气消减使他能再清楚地想一想.

sentences.en: The speaker dropped a hint of a possible modification of the proposals.
sentences.cn: 发言者暗示可能会修改建议.

sentences.en: They have used the same process for almost 50 years with only minor modifications .
sentences.cn: 同样的工序他们用了将近50年，期间只做过很小的改动。

sentences.en: They have used the same process for almost 50 years with only minor modifications.
sentences.cn: 同样的工序他们用了将近50年，期间只做过很小的改动。

sentences.en: With the modification of his anger he could think clearly again.
sentences.cn: 他的怒气渐消,又能清晰地思考了.

words.tran_cn: [助剂] 改性剂；[语] 修饰语；修正的人
调整，调节；吟咏；改变（嗓音的）音量（modulate的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 齿高变位量；齿顶高修正

trans.tran_cn: 修改，修正，变更，改良，改进，缓和，减轻，限制，[语]修饰，（用变音符号的）母音改变，[生]诱发变异，变态，变体，变型
trans.tran_en: a small change made in something such as a design, plan, or system
